entries.content: When the end of the road seems so close, I run into another problem like this... The mortise and tenon in one of the front legs came apart even through the glue-up. I routed a slot through the leg and skirt in order to put a floating tenon of sorts and in doing so, saw how terrible of a job I did with the joint. Next time, I'm definitely going to be taking my time with the mortise and tenons.
